game.title: The Lost Artifact

objective.#text: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.

description.#text: Embark on a journey through treacherous landscapes to uncover the secret location of the lost artifact and retrieve it.

game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

objective.#text: Talk to the hermit in the forest

description.#text: Locate the secluded hermit and gain information about the artifact's whereabouts.
